RelativeLayout:
<TextView android:id="@+id/label"
android:layout_width="fill_parent" android:layout_height="fill_parent"
android:text="Type here:"
/>
<EditText android:id="@+id/entry"
android:layout_width="fill_parent" android:layout_height="fill_parent"
android:text=""
/>
<Button android:id="@+id/ok"
android:layout_width="fill_parent" android:layout_height="fill_parent"
android:text="OK"
/>
<Button
android:layout_width="fill_parent" android:layout_height="fill_parent"
android:text="Cancel"
/>
